mapper.select: SELECT ski_bar.`activity`.`name`, ar.`score`, ar.`result_id`, ski_bar.`user`.`username`, ski_bar.`user`.`gender`, ski_bar.`user`.`telephone`, ski_bar.`user`.`email`, ar.`time` FROM ski_bar.`activity_result` AS ar LEFT JOIN ski_bar.`activity` ON ar.`activity_id` = `activity`.`activity_id` LEFT JOIN ski_bar.`user` ON ar.`user_id` = ski_bar.`user`.`user_id` WHERE ar.`activity_id` = #{activityId} ORDER BY score DESC;
